Script for Guard

Room 3 – Lobby

Alicia Droid: Not sure why I'm barking at the door now.
Alicia Droid: Maybe this will get the guard's attention...
[GUAR] Guard: What? How did that darn dog get in here?!
Alicia Droid: The keypad! I'll save those tones to Memory.
[GUAR] Guard: Hmm. You can run but you can't hide!
[GUAR] Guard: They must have ran outside.
Alicia Droid: Well. That was close.

Room 7 – Hallways

[GUAR] Guard: I have God and Anime on my side!
Alicia Droid: Hmm. Not very helpful.
[GUAR] Guard: **Beautiful acoustic guitar music**
Alicia Droid: Oh, that's nice. I'll save the music to Memory.

[GUAR] Guard: Help Computer! Stop all the downloadin'.
Alicia Droid: Oookay. Not sure what they mean.
[GUAR] Guard: **Sob** Leave Brittany alone!
[GUAR] Guard: Hey, who are you?
Alicia Droid: Finally, somebody who can carry on a conversation.
Alicia Droid: I'm looking for Room 53.
[GUAR] Guard: I see. Take two rights, a left.
[GUAR] Guard: Another left. Up a flight of stairs, then end of the hall.
Alicia Droid: Thanks!
[GUAR] Guard: No problem. Also, leave Brittany alone.
Alicia Droid: Uh. You got it.

[GUAR] Guard: Is this real life?
Alicia Droid: I think so. I think that was a rhetorical question.
Alicia Droid: Maybe I should try a different hallway.
[GUAR] Guard: It's Friday! Friday!
Alicia Droid: No no no. Just no.
